metadata.name: MACHINARIUM
metadata.description:
In this work, we touch upon the idea of ​​time and our artistic movement as Ukrainians. Time is a valuable resource, and an artist should always be in synergy with modernity. 

The filming of the video took place in an unusual format, and the dancer repeated the movements continuously dozens of times. Edit took about 8 hours in Davinci Resolve.  

The significant technique of Hyper Motion by Oleh and Animation dance by Nikkipop. 
2022, Ukraine, Lviv.
